description:
Director of Sales

MUST HAVE Flat "Hot Rolled" and/or "Cold Rolled" Steel processing and distribution background
• Evaluate, Upgrade, and Expand the number of Sales Reps.
• Train and educate all new hires.
• Align Sales Reps in identified Sales Territories.
• Establish Monthly, Quarterly, and Annual Sales Goals
• Determine the Number of sales calls per week
• Develop the Number of High Potential Sales Prospects with Account Strategies.
• New Accounts and New Business.
• Lead regularly scheduled Sales Meetings with a purpose.
• Establish Sales Process.
• Recap of Sales rep's weekly activity
• Pre Call Planning as appropriate.
• Define Sales Message.
• Regularly communicate current spot pricing and market conditions.
• Participate along with Senior Management in all buy/sell decisions for the Company.
• Support enhancements and implementation to company Social Media tolls to support and grow business.

Apologies in advance. If you do not have the right Steel experience, I will not be able to contact you. I appreciate your understanding.
